com.camerontec.util.data

Class DirectBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.data.DirectBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buffer, BufferOnByteBuffer
    Deprecated. 
    use other Buffer implementations.

    @Deprecated
public class DirectBuffer
extends Object
implements BufferOnByteBuffer
    A Buffer implementation which facilitates direct views over a range of byte array locations.

    The supported byte array locations are:

    • A byte array on the heap
    • A java.nio.ByteBuffer regardless of whether it is backed by on or off heap memory, memory mapped file, etc
    • An off heap memory region at a specified address.

    This implementation makes use internally of an excellent and open source implementation from the simple-binary-encoding project to do most of the work.

    This class is not thread safe.

        public boolean getBoolean(int index)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: Buffer
        Get the boolean value at the specified buffer index.

        Note that the method by which a boolean value is encoded is not specified. Therefore an accurate boolean value may only be retrieved if previously written via Buffer.putBoolean(int, boolean).
